description.en: TUYA driver for gateway from Tuya (Historical)
description.fr: Driver TUYA pour gateway de Tuya (Historique)
description.nl: TUYA driver voor gateway van Tuya (Historisch)
description.ta: Tuya இலிருந்து gateway க்கான TUYA டிரைவர் (வரலாற்று)

instruction.en: A tile for each socket will be created. Press and hold down on/off switch for aprox 5 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.
